item.description: I won a free VIP at McFadden's on Pine Street for tomorrow night, Thursday, June 10th! This means if you come before 11 (it is between 9 and 11) you will have no cover, discounted drinks and an appetizer buffett if you same my name, Jessica Brooks. Get as many people as you can to come because not only is this an awesome deal, but I can get the chance to win a $100 bar tab...which means if I do, you get free drinks.... not a bad plan! So come before 11 and say my name at the door!!
item.name: VIP at Mcfadden's
